title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 89.1 - Collection of deposits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 89.1 - Collection of deposits

State Regulations

Every licensee may charge and collect a deposit in
conjunction with the sale of beer in reusable containers larger than one gallon
(3.8 liters). When a deposit is charged, such deposit must be the same amount
for everyone for the same size container. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
89.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
